sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' class TimeStat extends React.Component { render () { const cur = this.props.audio.currentTime let dur = this.props.audio.duration if (isNaN(dur)) dur = 0 const ch = String(Math.floor(cur / 3600)) let cm = String(Math.floor(cur / 60) % 60) if (dur >= 600) cm = cm.padStart(2, 0) const cs = String(Math.floor(cur) % 60).padStart(2, 0) const dh = String(Math.floor(dur / 3600)) const dm = String(Math.floor(dur / 60) % 60) if (dur >= 600) dm = dm.padStart(2, 0) const ds = String(Math.floor(dur) % 60).padStart(2, 0) let curStr = `${cm}:${cs}` let durStr = `${dm}:${ds}` if (dur >= 3600) { curStr = `${ch}:` + curStr durStr = `${dh}:` + durStr } const string = `${curStr} / ${durStr}` return {string} } } export default class extends React.Component { togglePause = () => { if (this.props.audio.paused) { this.props.audio.play() } else { this.props.audio.pause() } } changeVol = (event) => { const newVol = Number(event.target.value) / 1000 this.props.audio.volume = newVol } render () { return (

Song Name

Artist Name • Album Name

) } }
